title: Lloyd Interview & More
itunes:title: Lloyd Interview & More
description:
The Breakfast Club sits with Lloyd and talks fatherhood, tour life, Irv Gotti, Ashanti & more.  Charlamagne Tha God is out today so DJ Envy & Angela Yee let the callers pick their Donkey of The Day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
